CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 30, 1953, pg. 27, reads: "Uptown Little League Opens Friday Evening.  Ready for LL Opener - The four teams who'll participate in the Uptown little League this summer are shown in the uniforms in which they'll play Friday evening when the first games of the season will be played.  The teams are shown above.  Top left is B. & M. Restaurant.  Kneeling, left to right, are Malayd Wilson, Cedil Wilkins, William Crawen, Douglas Jones, Larry Seil and Frank Zellers.  Standing: William Friday, Ben Simon, Raymond Jackson, Ronald Bush, Charles Evans, Albert Charley, George Davis, Clifford Carter and Ronald Gray... Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: B & M Restaurant Little League baseball team, kneeling from left: Malayd Wilson, Cedil Wilkins, William Crawen, Douglas Jones, Larry Seil, Frank Zellers; standing: William Friday, Ben Simon, Raymond Jackson, Ronald Bush, Charles Evans, Albert Charley, George Davis, Clifford Carter, and Ronald Gray on Kennard Field with Terrace Village in background
